noBackup: Your account is not backed up yet!
notMainnet: Do NOT send funds on the Ethereum mainnet (ERC20)
cloudOK: Your account is now secured on your cloud
noQuoteSend: No quote found. Please try with a higher amount or on
OnboardScreenOneTitle: Managing crypto is easy with Bangr
OnboardScreenOneText1: Bangr lets you buy, send and swap crypto in minutes
OnboardScreenOneText2: Never bother with gas or bridging anymore
OnboardScreenTwoText1: Bangr is non-custodial: we never access your funds
OnboardScreenTwoText2: Even if we were to disappear, you could still recover your keys!
OnboardScreenThreeText1: Your keys stay in your phone's Secure Element
OnboardScreenThreeText2: No more hack! Secure encrypted backup on iCloud
OnboardScreenFourText1: Bangr curates the best protocols and lets you deposit seemlessly
OnboardScreenFourText2: Don't try to time the market, let time do its thing
letsSecureItOn: Before we take you to it, let's secure it on
dontWannaSecure: I don't want to secure my account now
restoreTitle: Restore a previous account from your Drive
iosRestoreInstructions: After clicking this button, you will be prompted to select a file called 'bangr.wallet' from your iCloud files. Please select that file to recover your account.
choosePasswordAndroid1: Bangr will store an encrypted copy of your key on
choosePasswordAndroid2: If you ever lose your phone, you will be able to recover your account.
choosePasswordAndroid3: Be sure not to loose your password!
choosePasswordICloud1: Bangr stores an encrypted copy of your key in a file, which we will prompt you to save in your iCloud.
choosePasswordICloud2: If you ever lose your phone, you will be able to recover your account through this file.
choosePasswordICloud3: Be sure not to lose your password! If you do, bangr will not be able to recover your account.
choosePasswordICloud4: After clicking this button, you will be prompted to save a file called 'bangr.wallet' to your files.
choosePasswordICloud5: Make sure that you are choosing 'Save to Files' then depositing anywhere in your iCloud Drive.
saveToICloud: Save the file to iCloud Drive
